page.title: 16RECREATION & LEISURE SURVEY
page.content: A survey was carried out during June 1985 on the leisure and recreation activites of pupils in Govilon Primary School(class 4).The results were as follows.Most of the pupils in class 4 of Govilon Primary School stated watching television and reading were their favourite pastimes.The other pastime most people liked doing was cycling.Many other activities were listed from fishing to using a computer, to other things like listening to tapes and records.Only a few people took part in Scouts,Cubs,Girl Guides and Brownies, which was very surprising.In the nearby town of Abergavenny there is a Leisure Centre.It has many activities for instance a swimming pool,squash courts,gymnasium,cafeteria etc.However only 4 people in the class use the Leisure Centre more than once a week.
